parts.text:
Your role i s to act as an alarm , you have to check:Transactions{{1.ParsedTransaction.NumberOfShares}}, Wallet:{{1.RawTransaction.transaction.sourceId}} ,time{{1.RawTransaction.timestamp}}, then create an alerts of the trasactions wich will be sent to gmail. STYLING RULES:
Output ONLY raw HTML code. Do NOT use markdown code blocks (no triple backticks ```).
Use inline CSS to make it colorful and professional ,Do not include any conversational text or these instructions in the final output. Just the HTML string.Use emojis (ðŸš€, ðŸ’Ž).make the massege more funny, interactive and colorful. Keep it under 500 characters.

parts.text:
"Write a formal 'Loyalty Success Report' for Wallet {{1.RawTransaction.transaction.sourceId}}. They successfully held {{1.ParsedTransaction.NumberOfShares}} CFB. STYLING RULES: Output ONLY raw HTML code. Do NOT use markdown code blocks (no triple backticks ```). Use inline CSS to make it colorful and professional (e.g.,

Success Report

). Use a clean, white background container with padding. Do not include any conversational text or these instructions in the final output. Just the HTML string.
